name: Will you crash?
description:
* THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT *

Drinking has both long and short term affects. This game simulates some of the short term affects of drinking and its dangers.

Work is just down the road. Can you get there on time without crashing?


IMPORTANT: This is just a game. Never drink and drive in real life. I'm serious. It can feel that you are in control, but you are not. You can end up seriously hurt or hurt someone else.
